title: Updating to Android 10 on Pixel XL the Screen Saver clock has stopped working like it used to? Help!
content: I updated my Pixel XL to Android 10 and after that the screen saver clock or ambient display, however we say it has stopped working. No matter what I do it doesn't show up unless I do it myself by clicking "Start Now" button. Can anyone guide me on how to fix it or is this a problem or anything.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
